text: Károly Kővári (21 June 1912 – 20 April 1978) was a Hungarian alpine skier who competed in the 1936 Winter Olympics and in the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Hungarian male alpine skiers Category:Hungarian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Hungary Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Hungary Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics
title: Károly Kővári
